episode_event_general_ch0120_10_lusamine: Heh heh heh... Today’s our lucky day!
A Legendary Pokémon came right to us!

That’s odd... It’s not even looking at us. It’s like
we’re not even on its radar.
Doesn’t matter! Once we capture it, it’s ours!
Hahaha! Nice! Keep wearing it down!
You’re gonna be our Pokémon now!
Gwahahaha! Time for the finishing blow!
Drat! And we were so close, too!
I see. That must mean one has come to Pasio, too.

I can try to make things
right this time.

This is the second time I’m coming face-to-face
with a Necrozma.
But I won’t make the same mistakes as last time!
